data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brescovit, Antonio Domingos, Ferreira, Rodrigo Lopes, Silva, Marconi Souza, Rheims, Cristina Anne (2012): Brasilomma gen. nov., a new prodidomid genus from Brazil (Araneae, Prodidomidae). Zootaxa 3572: 23-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209007
